dtliExcerpt: Williams brings a surprising amount of steel to Sally Bowles, the devil-may-care British songstress who performs at the seedy Kit Kat Club in Weimar-era Berlin.
bwwExcerpt: What do you call a revival of a revival? A re-revival? In the case of this 'Cabaret,' you just call it fantastic.
